text: ra-nga huuina lungpui kha onyx eii, kuruk huuina lungpui kha carnelian eii, sari huuina lungpui kha quartz eii, kariat huuina lungpui kha beryl eii, kuo huuina lungpui kha topaz eii, soom huuina lungpui kha chalcedony eii, soomleikhat huuina lungpui kha turquoise eii, soomleini huuina lungpui kha amethyst eii.
